name: Hampton Inn Grand Junction

reviews.text: Having stayed at many Hampton Inns (and never really having a bad experience), I recommend the Grand Junction (Colorado) Hampton Inn as one of the very best. Immaculate rooms, easy parking, attractive lobby, excellent breakfast, and extremely friendly staff. Although it isn't adjacent to an interstate, it is adjacent to both the historic downtown area and a convention center.
reviews.title: The Best of Hampton Inns!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I love Hampton Inns, but this one was very good. The front desk was very friendly and the room was fantastic. The breakfast was good but not great. Parking was very adequate and easy. I would definately stay here again, and will probably always stay here when I visit Grand Junction.
reviews.title: Great Stay!

reviews.text: Backpack with iPod, dvd's and company laptop stolen while parked in the underground lot during 5 minute check-in put a damper on the rest of the trip. Guests should park in front when checking-in as it more visible and public.
reviews.title: Lock Your Car Doors while checking in! Learn from our mistake!

likes.disliked: — lack of security, no refrigerator, no microwave, under contructions pool/hot tub, out of order business center, victim of car break in while cheking in

reviews.text: No security cameras in this lot was a surprise to me when filing police report. There had been similar break-ins the week before according to front desk clerk so their casual attitude to this problem should be a concern. I was surprised the manager did not attempt to make contact with me to discuss the incident given the clerk had told him of our situation.
reviews.title: Super

reviews.text: Pros: Updated, nice beds, great downtown location close to restaurants, shops, public art.
reviews.title: Nice place, out-of-the-way location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I always select hotel based on location.
reviews.title: Good location, good room, great view

reviews.text: This hotel is right on the main street with all the eateries, close to the railway station, opposite a supermarket. It's perfect.
reviews.title: Terrible customer service

reviews.text: The room was large, with a view and internet connection. Nice bed, comfy chair and so on. No complaints! We only stayed on night, as planned.
reviews.title: Great Hotel

reviews.text: While in Grand Junction checkout the Rockslide Restaurant, the co national monument canyons, and the quaint main street.
reviews.title: best in G.J. - right in the thick of things

aka: Hampton Inn Grand Junction Hotel Grand Junction
